name: In re ESTATE of Margaret S. WANDEL, Deceased. Appeal of Barbara REITZ, Joan D. Gongaware and Karen (Wandel) Powers

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: In re ESTATE of Margaret S. WANDEL, Deceased. Appeal of Barbara REITZ, Joan D. Gongaware and Karen (Wandel) Powers.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed.
Each side to pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: E. David Harr, Greensburg, for appellant.
John W. Pollins, III, Hammer & Pollins, Greensburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
393 A.2d 433
In re ESTATE of Margaret S. WANDEL, Deceased. Appeal of Barbara REITZ, Joan D. Gongaware and Karen (Wandel) Powers.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 21, 1978.
Decided Oct. 16, 1978.
E. David Harr, Greensburg, for appellant.
John W. Pollins, III, Hammer & Pollins, Greensburg, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
